name: Five Nights At Billy's 1 (Karlson and FNAF Fan Game)
name_original: Five Nights At Billy's 1 (Karlson and FNAF Fan Game)
description:
Dani pls don't sue me i beg you.I will buy you milk if you don't sue me.

Karlson doesn't have any money to buy milk so,he decided to work for Generic Milk Company Name

And little did he know it was going to so much fun and fun and fun...

Minimum:

  • OS: 32-bit or 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 2GB (256MB VRam) RAM.
  • Free Disk space: 1GB.
  • Hardware: keyboard, mouse, and headphones
  • Milk

    Reccomended:

  • OS: 32-bit or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 4GB (512MB VRam) RAM.
  • Free Disk space: 1GB.
  • Hardware: keyboard, mouse, and headphones
  • Milk

Important!

The application will run on 32-bit and 64-bit x86 computers.

If the game crashes, use 64-bit only mode instead

If you can't find a shortcut for the game go here and make your shortcut

C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Programs\fnab\fnab.exe

Billy,Karlson,Dani,Willy,Red Evil Robot,Dani's Brother and Yellow Guy By Dani milkman

Fnaf by Scott Cawthon

Game by

@Game_Parade  and @bomberman100
